website_summaries.verdict: It's a fine basic device if you're just going to use it in the house, without the app. Even then, though, the connection issues would make me wary of relying on it.
pros: The Motorola baby monitor works fast out of the box
It is easy to use, and one of the most affordable camera/monitor combinations out there
cons: The third-party app is basically broken, and some of the features weren't even testable as a result
Even on the monitor at short range, connection issues are intermittent

customer_reviews.title: Charging connection/plug snapped off!!!  =(
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd Motorola MBP36S baby monitor. Each and everyone of them broke because the charging connection/plug is soldered so weakly it snaps off if you're not careful in attaching the charging cord to the monitor. I'm so irritated because this monitor is not cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Kaykay

customer_reviews.title: Not with the price at all
customer_reviews.text: Got this back in July 2016. Less than a year later it's going bad. The monitor is dark unless your in a dark room. The charging cord is bad! An it makes a lot of noises that make me think it's going to blow up or something. I needed a product I could trust and this is not it! I will never buy one again!!!
customer_reviews.author: melissa Gurule

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this! The screen went dark after 1week of use!! Can't even see baby. Can't return because I purchased before baby was here and now it's too late.
customer_reviews.author: ambermoon

customer_reviews.title: Worth it for a few months
customer_reviews.text: At first I loved it, but after a few months the parental unit wouldn’t charge. It works if I have the cord rubber banded on in a finicky way however the unit precariously stops charging and may or may not allow the unit to die in the middle of the night. I am afraid to take the rubber band off because it’s so finicky which means the unit is no longer mobile for us. Battery does hold a charge and works fine- it’s getting it to charge that is so difficult. Hopefully it has a warranty. I’m super disappointed. Wish I would’ve bought something else.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, picture clear, price is reasonable.
customer_reviews.text: Picture is clear(unlike the cheaper cameras I've tried) and you can see the baby decently well(even at night). It has speaker to talk to your baby, volume control to hear the baby, zoom control, a few lullabies(5 I believe) to play from the camera speaker, options to add/remove additional cameras, brightness control, temperature indicator to tell you how hot/cool the room is -- this temp control feature becomes red when it becomes too hot, I think at 85 degrees--, and timeout feature (5, 30, 60 mins). All in all, for the price and quality of image, this is a great camera.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Very poor performance and weak battery life
customer_reviews.text: This is our second monitor-the first was a non-name brand with great reviews. It had good features, but the video quality was horrible. This was a step up, but also has serious flaws. Pros: -Compact monitor display size and good range (150’ outdoor through brick walls) -Decent video quality even at night -Decent audio sensitivity with LED volume indicators -Pan/tilt works well Cons: -Battery on display unit takes 3 days to fully charge each time(after charging for 16hrs as directed by the manual). -Battery lasts for maybe 1hr on full charge. -No easy way to adjust volume or brightness with buttons-buried in a menu -started registering noises that weren’t in the room after a few weeks (LED lights blinking)
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Broke after one year
customer_reviews.text: I am appalled that a Motorola brand product created to keep babies safe is rendered useless after 14 months. The parent unit now has zero range and the monitor doesn't display a picture any more ( see pictures). I loved the product initially, but I can't afford to pay $135.00 every year to replace it. I contacted the manufacturer about the issues I was experiencing, and they offered me the option to purchase a new one for 102.00... not much of a discount. I'm really disappointed this product didn't last, I will no longer be recommending this monitor to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: user

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: I received this monitor before at my baby shower. It was used a lot and I purchased an additional camera. The monitor stopped working after a while so I ordered a new one. I ordered this again since I already had the other camera's. When I received it I couldn't pair the older cameras to this unit so I that was frustrating. But the main issue was that the night vision didn't work. I think this was a mass produced monitor and is just old. I had to return it but now I'm stuck with a few camera's from my original purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Aundrea N.

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE Monitor... two broken in less than 2 years!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product. I purchased my first one when my daughter was born, and within 8 months the parent unit died and would not charge. I purchased the same unit again, thinking it was a fluke and 10 months later, the same thing happened. For the price, I was expecting more usage! Customer service is terrible, too! SAVE YOUR MONEY... buy a different monitor!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: I will always be a Motorola Video Monitor lover!
customer_reviews.text: I had the same monitor I recieved as a gift at my baby shower 2years ago. My daughter ripped off the antena and now the monitor/camera won't work past (the camera being in her room and then it won't show on the monitor once you've reached 10-15ft) So I ordered a new one. When I recieved it, the monitor worked but the camera did not. But I just had to call customer service and they sent me a new camera. I've tried 4 Baby monitors and this was by far my faborite one. The picture is very clear, the lullubys that it plays is great, and the distance to walk around with the monitor is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: JCOlivas#2

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Pair With Older Releases of SAME Model
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because, like others, our parent device broke at the charging port and we had to buy the set. Our second monitor (of a different company) to break in the same spot. We don't understand why these things can't be made well. When received it didn't pair with the same model from our previous monitor set. Everything is actually different looking and less user friendly. Returning after reading all the other negative reviews affirming our distrust of this monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Petite Modern Life

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre monitor, but works
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews prior to purchasing this stating it was not the same quality as other monitors with the same model, and I agree. I owned the exact same model for 3 years and the battery died, I have two cameras to go with it so I ordered this monitor as a replacement so I could still use the cameras. It is an obviously lower quality than my last one. Picture isn’t as clear. Something is just “off” about it. But I do know my other one was more expensive, so for the price of this one I can’t complain too much. Bottom line- not the highest quality monitor, but gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stay away from Motorola
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product. Old monitor broke and tried to reach out to Motorola to fix it and heard no response. I couldn't wait so since I spent so much money on it, I bought a new camera with monitor assuming my old camera would connect to the new monitor and now I'd have two cameras. Not the case, they aren't compatible for whatever reason. Now my monitor is acting up after less than a year. Do not buy Motorola, I've had nothing but problems.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Would NOT recommend or buy again
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not worth the money. It worked very well for the first 6 months or so and before even having it for a year the battery life went out. It would die after about 15-20 minutes of being off of the charger. Also, the thermometer would jump around so much that it was pointless to try and depend on. One second it would say my daughter’s room was 40 degrees and the next second it would jump up to 75 degrees. Now, it has just broken completely. I woke up one morning and the screen was black and it won’t charge or turn on and makes a weird buzzing noise. Save yourself the trouble and invest in a better monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndie Grijalva

customer_reviews.title: Only works for a several months. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter and didn't use it for sometime after because she was in the NICU then in a bassinet for quite a while in our room. I used this MAYBE a total of 3 months and now it has completely stopped working. It won't even charge anymore! I do NOT recommend buying this product at all. I contacted the company to see if they will replace the monitor but if not I will definitely be going with a different brand when I buy a new one. Very very disappointed in this.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Koss

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I was wary to purchase this due to all the negative reviews but bought it because we needed a monitor that had a long range. I was happy with the product when we received it as it has the best range of the different monitors we have tried. However within 2 weeks of receiving the monitor it broke, and the parent unit could be no further than 15 feet from the baby's room or it would go out of range. I contacted Motorola and they were not apologetic and are requiring me to pay for shipping the product back in order to send me a new one. Horrible customer service and an extremely unreliable product.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca S

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the price, still prefer the Samsung
customer_reviews.text: I like this baby monitor, but I prefer the Samsung monitor. We use the Samsung monitor in our house, and have put this Motorola one at our mother-in-laws house. I think all the buttons are a little finicky, they seem mainly unnecessary. I wish you could control the sound volume without first needing to be in one of the menus. The screen is smaller than the Samsung. I would say the video and sound quality is the same as the Samsung. I just prefer the sleek look and the larger screen of the Samsung
customer_reviews.author: SanDiegoMommyTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Stay away... Not the same as the original product
customer_reviews.text: We first ordered one of these back in 2016 and wanted to buy an exact duplicate monitor... What is now being sold is NOT an exact duplicate. It has a different charging port. It feels lighter and flimsier, and it doesn't work as well as our original. Sound quality is awful and the range of the parent unit to the camera is horrendous... even with the antenna extended (we have never needed the antenna on our original unit). We've ordered TWO of these this month thinking maybe the first recent order was just a fluke--nope. It feels like this listing is a bait and switch. It is not the same product we ordered back in 2016.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Good features, poor quality picture
customer_reviews.text: We bought this camera for our daughters room for 2 reasons. One, you can move the camera with the parent monitor. I find this helpful since my daughter is all over the place when she’s sleeping. This way I can see her at all times. The second reason is that it tells us the temp of her room. This is nice to have since we live in Maine & heating with wood gets tricky sometimes. We like knowing her room is comfy. The only down side to this camera is the picture quality is very poor. Very grainy. Not the best but it’ll do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: morgan lane

customer_reviews.title: Green Dot sticker on some MPB36S' and not on others
customer_reviews.text: Be weary of trying to pair this MBP36S with another previously bought MBP36S. There is a "green dot" sticker near the SN on some of these and not on the others. Definitely buy a set with two Baby Units if you even think you might have two kids. We had this setup for our first child and liked it so was going to add another baby unit (but got another parent unit also b/c the battery has weakened over 2 years of use), well after trying all the instructions I could find, I finally called Motorola and they informed me of this "green dot" that makes the same model incompatible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good, until plug stops working
customer_reviews.text: In basically all respects, except one important issue, this monitor works extremely well. After nine months, however, it stopped recognizing when it was plugged in. We have to prop hard items against the end of the cord that goes into the screen for it to work. This happened with our first Motorola after two and a half years of use, which we accepted as wear and tear, but to happen again with a still new unit leads me to believe this is a fault of the brand. Wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: EK

customer_reviews.title: 2nd purchase both have broke
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase and second one that has now broken. It is not from wear/tear as I have not had the newer one that long nor does it go in and out of the outlet. The inside that connects to get the connection in outlet just falls out. I have wasted money on 2 now and can not be refunded since i am out of the time frame to return.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Amazing monitor **MUST NEED**
customer_reviews.text: I love this monitor. I have had the same one for almost 3 years now. I know it is not ment to be used outside BUT I have taken outside and forgotten that it was outside for now 4 months straight. It has been outside for HOTT Oklahoma days, below freezing winter storms, and now tornado winds. The sound and picture is STILL like new! I LOVE this and will always recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kala

customer_reviews.title: Instant set up is nice, picture quality excellent
customer_reviews.text: Used for a week so far. Instant set up is nice, picture quality excellent. We keep ours on the lowest volume setting and it seems pretty good, but maybe still a touch too loud. no background noise or interference. my hubs wears earplugs so he doesn't hear all her little cooing noises though. The pan/tilt/zoom is pretty critical if you actually want a video monitor bc even at two weeks old, our girl can scoot out of view. Our friends that have monitors without this feature often go back to the nursery to reposition the camera. Seems ridiculous when you're spending a couple hundred dollars on something.
customer_reviews.author: David R.

customer_reviews.title: The screen isn't the best out there but the microphone I keep on level ...
customer_reviews.text: We've tried several monitors. Our first was an older model of this one and it stopped taking a charge. We switched the battery and still didn't work. We only used it 6 months but bc we owned it more than 1 year we couldn't return to manufacturer. That being said, we tried several monitors and ended up right back with this one. The screen isn't the best out there but the microphone I keep on level 1 and can hear my son breathing. I love the music feature. Music soothes my son and it helps being able to manage from monitor so he doesn't see me. I also don't have any issues with distance or searching for signal.
customer_reviews.author: Shanna

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after only a couple of months
customer_reviews.text: This worked great until a couple of weeks ago. We thought it was just being glitchy, but it is progressively dying. It is losing signal in places the signal used to be strong. It has stopped responding to camera moving commands. The microphone is losing its clarity, and there is feedback noise on the monitor now. None of these things were issues in the beginning. We have only had this a couple of months, past return policy. :(
customer_reviews.author: YogaDesires

customer_reviews.title: Charger breaks!
customer_reviews.text: Great features but after 2.5 months of use, pins in the charger are bent and will no longer charge unit. Plug and unplug it once a day when I carry base unit downstairs for daytime use on battery power but am never rough unplugging USB connection. Motorola included a very cheap charger. I am now using another USB connector to charge it. Disappointed we paid so much for item to have this issue. I am going to explore warranty service on item since we have not had it that long.
customer_reviews.author: JP reviews

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a replacement for the same model that died after only two years. The previous generation was great, especially the night vision. This is a waste of money. Choppy night vision, the pan feature barely works and when it does it pans so far from where you're trying to point the camera, it would be easier just to manually position it. The battery lasts for a hot minute, constantly goes out of range when you're not far from the camera unit, and is a pain to even get to turn on. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Select this one
customer_reviews.text: I don't really see how this camera had the negative reviews it has. Worked great for us right out of the box. I enjoy the fact that it doesn't stream over wifi. Not for the baby room. The monitor always has great signal even if I'm clearly across on the other side of the house. The picture is clear. I can literally tell when his eyes are open or closed. The volume does go rather high but I prefer that so I can hear it if I don't see it. You can set ur screen to power save or to stay on for up to an hr. I personally leave my screen on. Would buy this camera again.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Some issues
customer_reviews.text: Good baby monitor but a few issues. We use this with an extra camera for our two kids in separate rooms. My issue is that you can only hear when a kid is crying when the cycle is on that camera. It doesnt alert you right away when it picks up noise unless it is currently on that camera. You also have to go into the menu to turn down the volume which is not convenient at all. Update- 6/13/16- After having it about 11 months the sound started getting crackly then at 13 months of use the speaker blew in the handheld device. I called Motorola and they said they couldn't do anything because it was outside its warranty.
customer_reviews.author: LauraJ

customer_reviews.title: Amazon dropped the ball on this one
customer_reviews.text: first I received a previously opened item that was missing a cord and damaged, they sent a replacement and the replacement is not compatible with my other mbp36s accesssory camera. I called Motorola, they have upgraded this unit and it is not compatible with the previous model cameras. The description at the time of purchase does not accurately describe he item you will be getting. If you need it to be compatible with other mbp36s cameras know that you may get the newer model (which is no better than the old model) and it won’t pair.
customer_reviews.author: critterseahorse

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Horrible battery life! Monitor dies in 45 minutes if not plugged in:/ Picture quality sound quality and overall function is great. Update: 3 months in and it won’t charge past 75%, which shortens it’s already short battery life. Don’t waste your money on this product! Spend a little more to get a better quality!
customer_reviews.author: Shaena Lutz

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible across same model/different years
customer_reviews.text: We have two other cameras purchased in 2016 same model. Our monitor broke and we needed a new one. Only after we purchased it and attempted to pair to existing cameras did we learn that it is not compatible with older camera models. So we would either have to find an old monitor on eBay, or we would have to drop $300+ to get all our cameras working. We returned it and will be going with a different company that actually uses common sense when upgrading their products to be compatible over time.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Yaun

customer_reviews.title: NOT BRAND NEW !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am totally dissatisfied with my order !! First of box was half opened, and the plastic bags that should cover the camera and video screen were placed on TOP instead of covering the camera and video screen. The camera lens is dirty, no sticker to prevent scratches (that customer usually removes) !! And the video screen has scratches on the side !! For a prime member or any customer this is unacceptable!!! I am very disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad that I made the choice to finally get a video monitor and that I went with this specific one. It is so clear and I was skeptical about seeing anything because my child's room is very dark, but the monitor makes it super easy to see exactly what my toddler is doing. It's easy to move around and you can adjust the volume and speak directly to your child from the monitor. A little pricey but really was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Annoying. Only lasts about 1 1/2 years
customer_reviews.text: I got this when my daughter was born in 2016. It last until 2018. We ordered a new one because the battery wouldn’t hold a charge. This one we bought in 2018 just crapped out. So if you only need a monitor for about a year in a half buy this one haha
customer_reviews.author: June Lunnin

customer_reviews.title: Quality went way down from
customer_reviews.text: I bought this monitor in 2016. I was surprised the how well it worked and clear the night vision was. My kid knocked the parent unit in the dishwater and I bought this to replace it and nothing about it is good. The sound randomly blinks out, the night vision looks like drunk glasses, the battery life is bad, there is no simple way to hang it on the wall. It is going back.
customer_reviews.author: HoopEarings

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend this b/w monitor
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Great picture quality. Easy to use. Was easy to set up. Love the temperature gauge. Also this camera can move up/down and side to side which is helpful when our little one rolls out of view. Battery life doesn’t last too long, maybe 45-60 minutes, but we keep it plugged in to the charger while using it which allows us to see him all night.
customer_reviews.author: Dian

customer_reviews.title: Battery loses charge. Version 36 cameras don’t work with it.
customer_reviews.text: I had the 36 for 18 months and then it stopped charging. Motorola replaced it, but 15 months later the same thing happened. Motorola told me they would replace but then stopped responding to my emails. I ended up buying the 36S because I had 4 cameras from my previous version. The cameras don’t sync. Then the battery started losing its charge and it was hard to turn on. Save yourself the time and frustration and buy the Infant optics monitor. It’s more money but SO WORTH IT.
customer_reviews.author: Sasnak

customer_reviews.title: Great picture
customer_reviews.text: Great camera! Gives you a very clear picture. You can adjust the lighting So well that you would think Baby is sleeping with lights on. The two way talking is really nice and as Baby grows and is able to talk more will be even more useful. The sound is wonderful on this. Only downfall of this camera is that the monitor is the only wireless part. Other then having a cord strung in babies room this camera works very well! Glad we purchased this model.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Second monitor port to die so it won't charge anymore...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this monitor! But this is the second one to have the female charging port crap out on us. Very frustrating since again, I like the monitor and the camera wifi signal actually reaches to the other ends of our house. Not sure I want to waste more money buying another monitor AND another camera that we don't need. But otherwise, I will need to buy 2-3 cameras for whatever new monitor system we get.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sound is really good- too good when your baby is crying at 3am
customer_reviews.text: Does everything you need to! Sound is really good- too good when your baby is crying at 3am! Video turns off after five mins when unplugged to save battery. Battery seems to drain fairly quickly so you can to keep charged if you can remember. Daylight camera picks up chest moving up and down, but doesn't on nighttime setting, which would be helpful. Temperature reading doesn't agree with AC unit in room, monitor reads a few degrees higher always. Range is good, and love zoom feature. Pleased with purchase overall, is v reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Rhiannon J.

customer_reviews.title: Monitor is awful, camera is only working part
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is terrible. It decided to stop taking a charge after 5 months, the battery only lasted about an hour without charging it, and now the antenna is completely broken without it being dropped. Seriously just woke up one morning to the antenna drooped over to the side. Only positives are from the actual camer: picture & sound quality are good, camera moves easily, I like that it gives you the temperature. Not worth the money though!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Good video, music needs volume controls
customer_reviews.text: Video good, camera movement good, temp feature nice, battery life good but wish there was a way to control the volume of the music. It's not loud coming out of the camera end in their bedroom However it is very loud coming out of the monitor end (since the sound is coming out of the camera). Camera unit should have an independent volume control. I have to turn music on and then turn volume on monitor down then keep screen on so I can visually see if they calm down and go back to sleep. Everything else works good though, still a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Wawa's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money. This thing is a piece of crap. I charged it for 12 hours as they suggested. The charge literally lasts maybe a half hour so you have to always have it plugged in. The picture is so grainy and delayed. We purchased the Infant Optics DXR-8, which blows this one out of the water, but had to return it because of interference with our Wi-Fi. Continuously said Out of Coverage. Back to the drawing board.
customer_reviews.author: Matt G

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Do yourself a favor and dont cheap out on the camera you buy. This is our second camera and monitor system we have bought, we bought a cheaper system and 8 months in its pretty shot and didnt work half as well as the motorola does. Its easy to hang and easy to link and use. The colors are great the sound is awesome and the night vision is perfect. The range of zoom and movement is better then any camera on the market. The battery life is not bad but not good. Off charger ypu get about 2 hrs but we very rarely find ourselfs without a close by outlet sooo.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph M.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Poor connection betweem the camera (baby unit) and the monitor (parent unit). Baby's movement in the monitor is often stopped. Imagine that you have a video call when the Internet connection is bad. Camera movement is not smooth. Camera moves a few seconds later I changed the direction. It was very disappointing becauae this never happened with the older version of this monitor. When we purchased the same model last year, everything was okay including communication between the camera and the monitor. By the accident, the parent unit was broken and we purchased the same model. However, we found out that a few things are changed. These changed made the product the worst ever.
customer_reviews.author: Momof2sons

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work well at all.
customer_reviews.text: Have an older version and it works great. Bought this one while expecting new baby to add on to old system and not compatible. Now that we're trying to use it, it gets very warm on the camera, the parent unit never shows the battery as fully charged and gets hot and worst of all the audio constantly cuts in and out. Customer service won't help because it was purchased over a year ago despite only being used for 1 month.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Never charged the battery right out of box
customer_reviews.text: For the price I expected this unit to be able to charge the battery out of box...guess what? It didn't . Returned and got another unit from another company at half the price and have had no battery issues. Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Ig88

customer_reviews.title: My old MBP33 monitor antenna broke, fixed, then ...
customer_reviews.text: My old MBP33 monitor antenna broke, fixed, then broke at the charging connectors, fixed, then the LCD screen broke, ARGH. But not wanting to throw out $200 of cameras, I figured I'd try the new version. Big mistake. It is not compatible with older MBP36 cameras, even though motorola website claims it is. Apparently this newer version without the USB port is only compatible with newer MBP36S cameras.
customer_reviews.author: p-rose

customer_reviews.title: Below average.
customer_reviews.text: I do not prefer this monitor. The only thing I like about this one is that it has a temperature gage and you can move the camera around with controls. The picture quality is not great and is choppy, not fluid movements. The battery life is awful and we have had to repair it once. I don’t really recommend this one. We have another brand with my daughter and it has a better picture and battery quality.
customer_reviews.author: RizzyPC

customer_reviews.title: DON’T BUY THIS MONITOR
customer_reviews.text: I had this model for two years (purchased at Target for my baby shower) and absolutely loved it! Unfortunately after my son got older he broke the antenna off the parent unit and it no longer reached in our room. So I decided it was time to go ahead and find another one and add a camera.... bad choice! I ordered and returned TWO of these monitors because they’re horrible! I’m not sure what happened, you would think that the newer ones would be better. The picture was awful, the remote pan couldn’t catch up with itself, and the volume was so low you couldn’t hear when our son was up and moving. We’re back to the original, broken one.
customer_reviews.author: Dawneen M Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Best monitors in the business (somehow), until something inevitably breaks.
customer_reviews.text: Mototorla is basically a scam. Bought this because Motorola said the monitor would work with my cameras after my monitor broke (which they wanted $123 to repair... yeah, I'm just buying a new monitor at that point.). Same series, different letter, and the monitor would never pair with my existing cameras. Went with a vtech and have been much happier without feeling like a company is trying to game me.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay S.

customer_reviews.title: Microphone broke :/
customer_reviews.text: Although I really like the fact that the camera turns, the microphone just stopped working right after the return policy expired... Super bummer, not a cheap purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: The product shown is not the one you will receive
customer_reviews.text: The product I received is not the version pictured (or even what on the box when it comes) I ordered this product a year ago to replace the first broken screen (my fault, I dropped it) it worked great up until about a week ago when it stopped taking a charge. I ordered the same product again, the box was the same, but the product in the box was different- I assumed this was just an error and exchanged the product. I just received it again, and same issue. (And this version is not compatible with any of the other cameras that I have) very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this older version after the monitor on my MBP38S broke. I think the quality if the image is even better in this model, despite the screen being smaller. If you are only viewing one kid, it's totally fine. Splitting screens it makes a difference with the smaller screen, but still, overall really love it!
customer_reviews.author: Agoliveira

customer_reviews.title: It was super easy to set up and start using
customer_reviews.text: I have used this monitor for approximately one month now. It was super easy to set up and start using. The camera has a great display during daylight or night. The sound quality is pretty good. Although even on the lowest volume level it is pretty loud. I covered part of the speaker up with tape and that seemed to mute the volume some. The only thing that disappointed me was the range. I found an iphone app that solved that problem. If I need to run to the barn or shop then I can use the iphone app. During the night or while I'm in the house then I happily use the motorola monitor.
customer_reviews.author: big_gatti

customer_reviews.title: Not a good monitor.
customer_reviews.text: I had the Motorola MPB36S for my first child purchased in 2016. I bought the exact same monitor for my second child just over 6 months ago....or so I thought. It appeared to be the same monitor that I really liked...it is NOT. The color vision does not work, picture is very grainy, the camera makes a loud and horrible noise when panning, the battery life is non-existent, and now after 7 months of unhappy use, the monitor will not turn on. When I checked the camera, it was very hot to the touch. My old monitor is still going strong but this supposed same one is awful. Motorola has lost another customer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A green sticker?  Pathetic
customer_reviews.text: A green sticker..... so my previous monitor with the exact same part number is not compatible. Pathetic I am afraid those units are not compatible. There is 2 different types of the mbp36s. There are units that have a round green sticker placed on the bottom of them and on the back of the parent unit under the battery. These are the newer models that were made. There are also ones without the sticker and these would be the older models. The 2 are not compatible. Apologies for such inconvenience. Kind regards, Eleni S. Binatone Support Team support@motorolastore.com
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Young

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Battery
customer_reviews.text: Product wouldn't be bad if the battery would stay charged. The battery wouldn't hold a charge long enough to make it through the night, so instead of being woken by a baby I was continuously woken by the dying battery alert. I tried to trouble shoot, not having the tv monitor on and making sure the sound was turned low but it didn't matter. I had to leave it plugged in all the time. Now, three months after using it, it's not receiving power through the charger and has died and I have no way of charging or using it.
customer_reviews.author: K Burns

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t ever work properly.
customer_reviews.text: From the beginning the camera would weave in and out. We could never have it disconnected from the power because it would start beeping like crazy with low battery even if it had been charging all night. Finally after a yeah, the camera aspect completely stopped working. This monitor was really crappy. Don’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise the sound quality is great.
customer_reviews.text: This is my third motorola monitor in about 2 years (two previous ones the monitor unit stopped working). This one is OK, my biggest complaint is the night vision camera doesn't give you the full pic on the monitor, just a round circle in the middle. This hasn't been the case with my other two motorola monitors. Otherwise the sound quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amy T.

customer_reviews.title: Good love the multi camrea feater n ability to remotley moved cameras
customer_reviews.text: Works good, got 2nd camera which if hit OK twice will rotate between camera every 10sec! However it has to keep the screen on, if display is off when trying to sleep at night doesnt rotate between camera so only able to hear one room! Would b nice if sound would still switch back n forth so could hear in both room rather then havin to leave the dispaly on all night!
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: works great, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Although the product itself works good. I wish it came with the wall hanger like the first one that I ordered. It gives me comfort and peace of mind to be able to see in the room, without having to go in. I like that I am able to speak through the unit. I wish the charge lasted longer. I find that it is plugged in a lot. But since I am in other rooms with outlets, it is not a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Diane J.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Won’t pair with my other cameras or unit of the same model even though the manufacturer says it should. I returned them and am fed up with the poor quality of Motorola baby monitors. Batteries don’t last, the cycle function is always iffy, and the lullabies are far too loud to use if you want to still hear your baby!
customer_reviews.author: Obabakakayo

customer_reviews.title: Still strong at three years old
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been using this going on three years now. Great quality for the money. It’s been through a lot. It’s currently missing its antenna and screen is cracked but it’s still going strong! Love the big screen
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Reedich

customer_reviews.title: Worse than earlier model
customer_reviews.text: Went right to this product for our second baby after really liking the previous model for our first. Not nearly as good as the old model! Takes 6 seconds of pressing the power button to even start to turn on, terrible battery life and range (even cuts out one bedroom over). Monitor has stopped communicating with the camera a few times in the middle of the night, meaning I've not heard my newborn cry for me. The camera quality is good, and I can easily tell if baby's eyes are open or closed when fussing in the middle of the night.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Smallwood

customer_reviews.title: Not working after less than 4 months.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one of these we purchased. The first one we purchased in 2016 for our first child is still going strong, however this one we purchased in November 2018 has faults already. The screen goes on and off all night for some reason, if I were to need another camera I’d look for something more reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Should have listen to reviews :/
customer_reviews.text: I bought this at the end of Oct. It is Feb 2nd and it stopped working today :(. The monitor won't turn on. I'm going to take it apart and see what I can do but I am so sad. This was a lot of money for my family but I felt I needed it to sleep peacefully. I wish I would have spent the extra $30 to get a better one with better reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Massage by Brittani

customer_reviews.title: Terrible monitor
customer_reviews.text: I’m really unhappy with this product. After less then a year of use the screen gave out completely, after a month long fight with amazon and Motorola amazon finally sent us a brand new one, within a few weeks of use the screen is already cutting in and out. I would not recommend this product to anyone. I’m so disappointed and this wasn’t a cheaper monitor either.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Barone

customer_reviews.title: Monitor doesn’t last more than a year
customer_reviews.text: We really tried to like this product. Over the course of 3 years we went through 2 sets because the battery life of the monitor is so terrible. The cameras are decent quality and never had issues as long as we had power. The monitor itself has a terrible battery life where we had to keep it plugged in for the past year in order to use it. The micro usb insert on the monitor overtime seems to wear out which is more than likely why it never stays charged.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Terrible battery.
customer_reviews.text: We have had an earlier version of this camera for three years and love it. This model however has been nothing but trouble. I love the ability to move the camera angle from the monitor, but the battery is so terrible we can never unplug it. The company even replaced the whole monitor/battery...It worked for about three weeks. Save your money and buy a different model or brand.
customer_reviews.author: em

customer_reviews.title: Choose another monitor
customer_reviews.text: The monitor works fine, until it doesn't. We have two of these and both monitors have stopped accepting a charge. Everything worked fine for a few months, then they go bad. The seller does not honor returns and so you are stuck with a camera and no way to watch it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark E. Schamel

customer_reviews.title: Garage
customer_reviews.text: 100% pissed off at this purchase. I had this model and got a additional camera 8 months ago. Well a few months back the antenna broke so it’s cuts out constantly. Decided will buy a new one because just spent $80+ on another camera. Well this unit won’t pair with my cameras. So even though they all say mbp36s it means nothing. Now I’m still just screwed. On top of all that In the few days I bought it the price went down $16. Never ever buying Motorola again.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Last Long
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as I hoped. The picture quality is less than DVD and display only lasted a few months before it could not connected to camera anymore.
customer_reviews.author: DW627

customer_reviews.title: "Its like the same thing as the old one
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to work with a previous Motorola system where in the video monitor stopped taking a charge. This unit will not connect to my old camera, despite the cameras looking identical and the numbers beneath the cameras being the same. It does not hold a charge at all. Old unit would show that eventually the battery was full but this one seems to be always charging. I would return it but I stupidly through out the box. "Its like the same thing as the old one, what could go wrong."
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: but battery life is complete garbage, needs to be plugged in and the camera ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased Oct 2017, now Aug 2018. Camera still works, but battery life is complete garbage, needs to be plugged in. The remote doesn't move the Camera anymore, so make sure you are set up on what you want to see. Was great the first 6 months but then it starts to go downhill, got to love planned obsolescence
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Good while it lasted, I guess
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had two of these baby monitors & both of them stopped working after less than a year. I loved it so much which is why I bought it a second time but I should have known cause it has bad reviews. I didn’t bother with customer service because the reviews also say that sucks so I imagine that’s accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have two of these and have used them since birth! One to see in the crib and one for the play area of his room. I love that you can remote pan/tilt/zoom, the talk-back function, and the noises through the camera. One of the cameras fell (thanks Vusee Baby Monitor Shelf) and now the sound does not work through the monitor.
customer_reviews.author: H. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is only used when our grandchild is over. It is not as clear as the one they have at home & without all of the bells & whistles, but like my husband says we only had sound monitors with no pics at all. It works well for us & as little as she sleeps here.
customer_reviews.author: barbclay

customer_reviews.title: Best monitor out there.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why there are any negative reviews. This camera is perfect, clear screen, amazing long distance reception, and the sound quality is spectacular. I had the older model but it was stolen along with other items in a backpack so I purchased this newer model. It is so great. I have no complaints. Very safe as it beeps if it is low on battery or if it loses signal. Love this monitor.
customer_reviews.author: jeremy griffith

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy! The monitor goes in and out every ...
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy! The monitor goes in and out every few minutes. It just shows a black screen with the Motorola sign in the middle. Turned it off and on and just decided to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Don’t get it if you need it long term
customer_reviews.text: I’m mad. I bought this product on may 25th 2016 just a little over a year ago planning to use it worth a second camera for my toddler and infant. With in the first month the battery stopped working well and would die after 20 minutes. Six months later it had to be plugged in or it wouldn’t turn on and now it stopped turning on period.... it sounds like it wants to but it won’t turn on. So now I spent 100 dollars on something I can’t use. Thanks...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One year max before it stops working
customer_reviews.text: We got one of these for baby shower and it lasted to my son's one year birthday before the connection between the minitor and cord crapped out. Wouldn't charge. Replaced cord -- same thing. It was the monitor. Got sick of putting a hair and around it to keep it together for charging so bought another. Less than a year and same problem. A bit too expensive for such short lifetime. Other than this problem worked very well!
customer_reviews.author: NewMana

customer_reviews.title: Have bought two. Neither lasted more than nine months
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this monitor.... while it works. The construction is so poor, I guess. Plugging and unplugging the charging cord causes the port to wiggle inward and eventually become unattached and just rattle around inside (and make the monitor useless). I am so ticked I gave it a second chance (and another $200) to just have the same thing happen. Total piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Teagan

customer_reviews.title: Good Alternative to Wifi Monitors
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a monitor that doesn't use wifi so I went with this one. I love it's ability to swivel around the whole room! Sound and picture quality are good but the battery life isn't great. You can only take it off the charger for 2ish hours at a time. But I always have the charger nearby so it's no biggie.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Terrible battery life
customer_reviews.text: For our first child I had the model before this and that would get great battery life. Two years later, it outlasts this model by about 3x. I even bought a replacement thinking it was just a defective battery pack. You are supposed to charge for 16 hours prior to first use and I did. Turn on and five minutes later, a bar is already gone. At full charge, you get about twenty minutes. I’ve returned both purchases and will look for something better.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan AZ

customer_reviews.title: No longer charging
customer_reviews.text: We got this for its video capabilities and after researching thought it was the best one to go with. It was perfect no issues for about 3 months then the charge wouldn't stay for longer than an hour so we kept it pulled in. Now the charger has stopped working and the monitor is no longer working. I am very annoyed as this was a great monitor 5 months ago and with the price of this we thought it would last years! Very disappointed. Will be contacting Motorola today hopefully they can help us.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Good picture but lots of cons
customer_reviews.text: Short battery life. Small range **My biggest complaint is that when you turn the screen on, it saves the last picture for a second then flips to real time. This FREAKS a parent out when you see an empty crib for a second. Also, several buttons needed/steps just to turn volume up or down. Good picture quality is my only positive for this item.
customer_reviews.author: Shell

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed.
customer_reviews.text: 1. Video lags, doesn’t keep up with the child’s movement so it’s almost choppy. 2. Battery life is horrible out of the box 3. Not compatible with other motorola monitors. ( Found that out after my dual quit working after 10 months) 4. Charger has to be in the perfect spot to charge 5. Monitor goes back to default settings after you turn it off. (I keep the vol level at 1, but every time I turn it back on it defaults to a 2). 6. Contacted customer service and opened a claim number, never received a response.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn Jerin

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money!!
customer_reviews.text: This baby monitor is terrible. The battery doesnt hold a charge, the monitor wont pick up signal from the bedroom to the kitchen which is maybe 15 feet, MAYBE. There are two sound levels that work, no sound or so loud you can hear the neighbor's dog barking from the house 3 acres over, but no happy medium. Literally the worst baby product I have ever purchased. So dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Battery Life is Terrible
customer_reviews.text: The battery life stinks! Only 3.5 hours so you have to keep it plugged in all night long. And when it's running on the battery the screen will time out after 60 minutes. You can't set it for longer. For the price of the unit it really should last a lot longer. I won't be purchasing this particular one again. Also, you get terrible feedback if you have the monitor close to the room the camera is in. It's a permanent echo. Oh and there is no user manual for it so you have to try and figure out the menu yourself. You get the hang of it after awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: not working correctly
customer_reviews.text: Had one of these before, and absolutely loved it. This time, it was different. The product was NOT working from the day we got it. The monitor is very choppy (even though the signal to the camera is perfect), the sound keeps cutting in and out, and the temperature is wrong (we have a thermometer in the room reading the correct temperature). Very disappointed in the product. Not sure if it is faulty, or if the quality has just declined.
customer_reviews.author: DoublVrB

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this for our new baby. We ordered it to replace our older model because the sound didn’t work anymore. After 15 minutes of using this one the screen went black. So now we can hear the baby but can not see her on the camera. Very dissatisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: But I love the fact I can see my kids and make ...
customer_reviews.text: Yes it I have noticed a few times there are glitches, The charging seems to take a long time. But I love the fact I can see my kids and make sure they are in bed. You can move the camera to looking around the room, another feature is that you can play music and change the volume to a soft or to loud music.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney C.

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is too short
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is a huge disappointment. It is our 4th Motorola monitor. With our 1st child, we had a similar version but had to replace it twice. We thoughts since it's been 3 years we'd give this new version a try. Unfortunately, we are having similar issues. The picture quality is not the best, but the worst part is the battery life. The monitor unplugged (without the picture on) only lasts about 2 hours. This is not what the description advertised. We are very disappointed and frustrated. This monitor has only been used for 4 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this
customer_reviews.text: I regret buying this monitor! I have another Motorola and I thought this one would function the same but it doesn’t. Very poor battery life and the camera is hot all the time if left on. My baby stares at the green light on the camera so this doesn’t help with sleep. I’m also bummed I can’t link it with my other monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Pio

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate....... purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I have a 22 month old who has been in our bed since she was born. After a big transition to her own bedroom downstairs I purchased this monitor to help with my piece of mind. I read many different reviews along with the bad and went for it. The monitor has a clear display image, many different control option and camera move options. All together I am more than pleased with this purchase and will be purchasing another camera for baby #2 due November.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Breland

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Quit working after only using it a few times. The picture and sound went in and out then it just quit working all together. Very disappointed. I will not be purchasing this brand again or recommending this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Crisp

customer_reviews.title: Love it, but wish the screen would stay on indefinitely when unplugged
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Great picture quality, great sound, easy to setup, good battery life. The only thing I dislike is that, when the monitor is unplugged, the screen goes off after an hour. I wish there was an option to leave the screen on indefinitely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
